title: Swap Maui Lane branding to user-provided logo (including favicon/app icons)

requirements.summary: Add generated static logo/icon assets derived from MauiLaneCareHome 0-1.png under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with explicit filenames and required sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: New logo assets exist in frontend/public/assets/generated/ derived from "MauiLaneCareHome 0-1.png" at the required sizes (at minimum: 512x512 for primary logo, 32x32 for favicon, 180x180 for Apple touch icon, 192x192 for app icon).
All generated files are referenced via absolute public paths (e.g., /assets/generated/...) and load without 404s in the running app.

file_operations.description: Create square primary logo asset derived from the uploaded "MauiLaneCareHome 0-1.png" at 512x512 for in-app branding and header usage.
Create favicon asset derived from the uploaded "MauiLaneCareHome 0-1.png" at 32x32 for browser tab icon usage.
Create Apple touch icon asset derived from the uploaded "MauiLaneCareHome 0-1.png" at 180x180 for iOS homescreen usage.
Create app icon asset derived from the uploaded "MauiLaneCareHome 0-1.png" at 192x192 for app icon/PWA-related usage.

requirements.summary: Update centralized branding config so all in-app logo renders use the new generated primary logo asset.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/lib/brand.ts points BRAND.logo.path to the new generated 512x512 logo asset path under /assets/generated/.
The login (ProtectedGate) and header (MauiAppShell) display the new logo (no old logo visible anywhere those surfaces render).
BrandLogo fallback initials are not shown when assets are present (no image load error).

file_operations.description: Update BRAND.logo.path to reference the new static public path /assets/generated/maui-lane-logo.v3.dim_512x512.png so BrandLogo renders the updated image everywhere it is used (e.g., ProtectedGate and MauiAppShell).

requirements.summary: Set favicon and touch/app icon links in the HTML head to reference the generated logo assets.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html includes a favicon link referencing the new 32x32 logo asset under /assets/generated/.
frontend/index.html includes an apple-touch-icon link referencing the new 180x180 logo asset under /assets/generated/.
Reloading the app shows the new icon in the browser tab (favicon) after cache refresh/hard reload.

file_operations.description: Add/update head link tags to reference the static assets at /assets/generated/maui-lane-favicon.v1.dim_32x32.png (favicon) and /assets/generated/maui-lane-apple-touch-icon.v1.dim_180x180.png (apple-touch-icon); ensure these load as static public assets without routing through the backend.
